titleStmt.title: Mr. Pepys to the Lord Mayor upon the present state of Christ-Hospital. To the Right Honourable Sir Humphry Edwin, Lord Mayor
titleStmt.author: Pepys, Samuel, 1633-1703.
Edwin, Humphrey, Sir, 1642-1707, recipient.

notesStmt.note: Dated at head: Tuesday, Octob. 25. 1698. York-Buildings.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
